resources.string: This location is very far from the previously-entered location in this session. Please verify its accuracy.
This location is incorrect. Please start a new session.
This date/time is before your session date/time. Please verify its accuracy.
This date/time is after your session date/time. Please verify its accuracy.
The tag ID and tag color must be filled out.
This tag ID is not recognised. Please verify its accuracy.
This tag color does not correspond to the selected species. Please verify its accuracy.
This length seems to be too large. Please verify its accuracy.
This length seems to be too small. Please verify its accuracy.
This weight seems to be too large. Please verify its accuracy.
This weight seems to be too small. Please verify its accuracy.
